name: Broadcast Bandits
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR WEB.

A SynthWave inspired turn-based heist escape!

You just stole the solar system's most valuable Specs - right from under the nose of the nefarious Cash Corp. You've begun the upload to your boss, but intergalactic transmissions can take a long time! Evade the Cash Corp goons while you broadcast your specs - but most importantly keep your transmission alive!

Play your cards to move your ship around the playing field. Your action always resolves first, followed by the enemies. Then you'll zoom forward!

Keep you broadcast going by gaining battery power in one of two ways:

Knock enemies into barriers, or asteroids to steal their juice, or you can burn a card and dismantle it for that sweet energy!

Both are critical for sending your boss the all important Specs you stole!
